name: Tess Yates
text: Nice place, good food! The pub part is kinda tucked away, plenty of screens to watch more than one game at a time. The pizza was on point too. Just sad I discovered it right as I was moving away.

name: Amber Apple
text: Great staff and it was a very versatile environment that welcome's family and and bar patrons alike!

name: Yisroel Huffman
text: Wonderful atmosphere and very personal service. The menu was fresh and enchanting. Will easily recommend this restaurant to friends. Affordable prices and big portions. Great work.

name: Natasha Edwards
text: Fast and friendly service sideways really good as well

name: Cory Hollingsworth
text: Love this spot! Best in town for sure. Staff is always great. Food is always tasty. Drinks are always cold. And the owner is amazing. Always going over and above to keep this gem running smoothly. Thanks!

name: Reid Adams
text: Waitress' were nice and service was good. Pizza was below average. Got 2 dollars worth of quarters for the arcade game which proceeded to eat all the money and not work. Instead of refunding us the 2 dollars the manager said they couldn't do anything about it. Now they lost a customer over it.

name: Jessica Abers
text: The pizza tasted very old, it almost tasted sour. The only time their pizza tasted gross I mean it was awful I couldn’t even finish my slice. I was very disappointed considering how much I thought I loved Pizza Schmizza :(

name: summer pilcher
text: Tried calling 4x at 6:30pm to order a pizza and it went straight to voicemail. My husband went in at 6:40pm to order pizza in person and she said they couldn’t make a new pizza when they don’t close until 7pm? When my husband asked what was left she said a couple pizzas but she had planned on taking them home. This place is a joke.

name: Tammy hamilton
text: Very nice costumer service. The morning lady was very nice and made sure we were satisfied with our order. Thank you

name: Diane
text: Great when you just want a single slice of pizza.

name: Lexi Martin
text: Good grub food. Good happy hour stuff. And nice friendly staff. Clean cozy little environment. And they usually always have sport events on.

name: Corey Hill
text: Pizza here was great! I love that there's a new flavor every month! (Spaghetti was my favorite, Mediterranean was my second). Service is fast and friendly... Except for the bar. That was a very slow experience, even if it was literally just …More

name: Keith Stevens
text: Best staff ever! Also pizza is delicious

name: Spike Jones
text: Great food.

name: Matthew rickard
text: Great place - they helped us host an awesome awards lunch for our school kids who did well in our fall fundraiser.

name: Nolan Bockstiegel
text: If you like Schmizza this is good place to choose. Staff friendly and pizza was good as always. Bar looked like it had some good specials going on and I probably wouldn't mind stopping in food and beer and a slice.

name: Holly Donnelly
text: I have eaten here a few times and it has always been great. Tonight we went in for dinner and it took a little longer than usual for the pizza to be done. I hadn’t really noticed, however, the owner did and came over to acknowledge how long …More

name: Logan Knowles
text: Great for slices of pizza.

name: Josh Barnes
text: Consistent quality pizza and good service

name: Jason Lee
text: Great little bar for Canby Football Pre-Game!

name: Jenna Rae
text: Terrible service. Spend your money else where. Wait to tip until they actually get you your order. Was asked if a gift card would be alright for a refund. Absolutely not. Not only did you waste my time and forget to make my order you expect me to come back? No thank you.

name: Stacie Houchin
text: Nice place and good food

name: Carpet Geeks Scheduling Team
text: Pizza by the slice is awesome! Buy a whole pizza and it isn't the same. When I do get a whole one I re-heat on high heat before eating. They do this to their slices and it makes the crust crispy, otherwise it can be too flimsy.

name: Dana Lefever
text: Fast and friendly service. Great tasting food. Yummmmm love that I can watch ther blazers games too.

name: ANTHONY Helgeson
text: Pizza was good but a little pricey

name: Sortabmx
text: Great pizza and good hang for friends

name: Andrew Kapur
text: Great slices. Good selection. Well made marinara. Tummy always feels a bit funny after though.

name: Lisa Berglund
text: Good size for a pet. Yummy food, great service and a bar, what more could you ask for?

name: D Riz
text: Great little place but understaffed. The young lady server worked hard but the place was packed which made service slow.

name: Anaheed Hill
text: Really nice staff and clean facilities. Really good menu too. It isn't my favorite pizza place but I wouldn't say no to going back.

name: Cece Reigns
text: Loved this pizza!!! Came from Woodburn on one of those I can't decide what I want to eat nights. So my man and I drove around and came across Pizza Schmizza!! Open late and delish!! Had good vegetarian options and big slices! Reasonably …More

name: Phillip Mountford
text: First time here.... Not disappointed for what I expected....

name: Mauriceadam Marquez
text:
Really good service and excellent food.
I'll definitely return to have a beer with friends.
The owner was very friendly and accommodating to our large group which included the wrestling team.
Maurice A Marquez.

name: Tasha Mowdy
text: Dip sticks with alfredo sauce!! Yumm!

name: Alex Hart
text: Had some pasta when they first opened. It was pretty good. When I returned to have it again, I found out their menu was greatly reduced in size while they figure out how to prepare things fast enough. Since then, I've been checking up …More

name: Chelsi Grindel
text: We just tried Schmizza for the first time tonight and it was delicious! They allowed us to do a half and half pizza because the hubby and I can never agree on a pizza and I loved that I was able to get a side salad as well! The price was a little steep for what we got but still really good.

name: Jamie Thompson
text: Sure great food & service! Evertoneis always friendly! The ONLY downfall is that they don't deliver.

name: Andrew Mullins
text: Great service. Good food.

name: Shad Bruns
text: Good good, good people, very good choice if you come to smile

name: Donald Gagliardi
text: The evening bartender is great the digital jukebox is a welcomed addition also and we couldn't go wrong with Sundays being happy hour all day in the bar. We will be back thanks for a nice time and food

name: Patrick Bernhardt
text: Good prices, fun bar, and ownership cares about their customers

name: Dawn Fredricks
text: We had a very large group,  food was great and they took good care of us!

name: sandra goodwin
text: I paid $50 for a small pizza and 6 wings. The order was not correct and I didnt feel like going back again to get the order corrected. I say again because I'd been up to ask for corrections  already. I cant say I would go back.

name: my baddest Bushong
text: Very very small pizza at a very very very extra large price..  medium sized pizza 24$  wow. No specials no coupons...viva dominoes.same price. 3 pizzas and wings....

name: Stacie Houchin
text: Pizza by the slice, beer and football games!  ❤️

name: Angi Dilkes Perry
text: In only its second week, the team at Pizza Schmizza in Canby is doing a great job. They expedited a single slice for my very hungry son and we all enjoyed the food, atmosphere, and service.

name: Betsy Ramos
text: Very rude customer service, the lady practically shoved me stuff and rolled her eyes, a lady with blonde hair already mature and should know what decent customer service is , which she did not provide, pizza is great otherwise.

name: A Mi Lado
text: The pizza is like fancy pizza lunchable got put in a toaster oven, only to come out slightly warm..... I'd rather have McDonalds personally.

name: Mike Froyd
text: Great pizza and a friendly attentive staff. This will definitely be our first choice when it's time to feed the family.

name: Dean Levi
text: Good pizza and drink selection. Could have more dark beers.

name: Matt Williams
text: Good pizza and price

name: Ana Cazares
text: I placed an order pepperoni jalapenos with boneless wings. I live 5min away got home pizza cold, bone in wings and jalapenos just dumped on top!!! I will not order from them again, but recommend you dine in

name: Trinity Knieriem
text: If I could put a "Negative" mark here, I would. When looking up the menu, there are a few items that are marked *only some locations*. But, no where on their site does it state that some of their locations are Pizza Only. I can guarantee …More

name: Melinda Allhands
text: Best wings in town, not to mention, dang good pizza. The kitchen sink is my favorite.

name: Katie W
text: I have a food allergy and asked the person taking our order a specific question about an ingredient. She didn't know and naturally turned to the manager. Directly in front of me, the manager said, "I don't have that allergy and I don't care. Why are you asking me?!" This is NOT a safe place if you have any food allergies.

name: Tomas Chavez
text: Visiting from out of town and this place has great pizza and a great staff! Will do back anytime I'm in Canby!

name: Daniel Dawson
text: Great food. Price is fair.

name: Caitlin Parker
text: Miss the personality most schmizzas have but food was just as tasty and prepared fast, we'll be back!

name: Priscilla Canterbury
text: Im an employee at this canby location. We have been working hard to work on the attitudes and atmosphere of our location. We have since added sandwiches and pastas plus a wide variety of salads to our menu as well as on sundays we offer …More

name: justin mills
text: Always a nice place to stop or a cold one

name: Mark Bjork
text: This is my first time having pizza schmizza. It is not that great, I was disappointed. Pizza too saucy and over priced for the quality. Dominos up the street is better and could get 3 pizzas for the price of one lousy pizza from pizza …More

name: Paul Toole
text: Great happy hour and wonderful pizza.

name: Renee Shaw
text: Love the crust-excellent pizza!

name: Judy Updyke
text: This was the worst pizza I have ever had. If you like card board, this is the pizza for you.

name: Kirsten Martin
text:
No way. The shop was dirty, and had a very limited selection of pizza.
& when we did get out pizza it was soggy! Not to mention the guy touching all the food with his ungloved hands. I was so excited for this place to open up! Unfortunately, I won't be back.

name: makinudie
text: A little pricey, but delicious!

name: Leonard Odell
text: Great experience

name: Michael Stephens
text: Great food and service

name: Malaki Mike
text: Good stuff!!

name: Kitty Hunt
text: Great service, friendly, helpful, courteous

name: Roxe Shadley
text: We had lunch here today and while we were waiting for our cold pizza we were watching the girl behind the counter. She went from taking money to get the customer a piece of pizza. Didn't bother to wash her hands

name: Frank DeRoberts
text: Good food.

name: Zayne Richmond
text: The pizzas are triangles.

name: Nate FiveOhTree
text: Pub is great

name: DeathWalker 1661
text: I come in often and they help right away with everything possible, Big thanks to Travis and the staff!

name: laura green
text: Wendy Berkey is a 10!!! Ok, 12!!!

name: Riley Esmay
text: Good pizza

name: Wendy Tobias
text: Ok

name: Koolaid
text: Great Pizza, great drinks

name: Bryan Abarca
text: Really good food 🍕🍕🍕

name: Janice Blomquist
text: Delicious!

name: Gregory Holland
text: Good food and drinks
